original_title: あなたに愛されたくて。 松下紗栄子
overview: A large contract that the salesman's husband took. The source of the order was Saki's boss, Kamata, who left the company when she got married. On her last day as an office worker, Kamata suddenly stole Saki's lips. Without knowing her past, her husband invites Kamata to her home.
title: I Wanted To Be Loved By You. Matsushita Saeko
